Song:
  Tempo: 100 
  # Kit is defined, but has no sounds. This is valid.
  Kit:
  Flow:
    - Verse:  x2
    - Chorus: x2

Verse:
  - test/sounds/bass_mono_8.wav:   X...X...
  - test/sounds/snare_mono_8.wav:  ..X...X.
Chorus:

  - test/sounds/snare_mono_8.wav:  .X.X.X.X
